post.body: Have fun in HK! I'll be fine (I think) .. :)
I find myself being extremely biased towards people who also favor Spain, that includes a French boy. Haha. He's coming back tmr! :D
Strangely in a romantic mood. I'd even bring you to Spain. (Partly cuz I really wanna visit that place--and my Spanish boys are back home!)
I'm exactly the sort you'd call a fault-finder, and that makes it very hard for me to sustain an intimate r'ship. It's gonna be a problem...
Oh, reminded me... I dreamt of someone. No wonder I woke up so late!
Oh, and of course, (3) There's just no more room to go forward! :p
I'm horrible at progressing because (1) I'm fearful (2) I get bored usually, when I'm almost there. Not good. I need to learn.
But I've been in this stage too often without progression. :(
Woke up to some messages. I like being in this infatuation stage. Every small thing makes me happy and excited. :)
Hue to Hanoi looks like a NEVER ending journey.
It's true. All I need now is a simple, fun-loving, easy-going and normal girl. I'm happy talking about nothing serious.
Wasn't too upset about my grades, but the folks around me kept suggesting that I should be sad abt my current 3.7/4.0 -- and I did. Sigh.
And guess what, he JUST uploaded the grading criteria for our term paper. WHERE WAS IT WHEN WE WERE WRITING. Fuck.
Disgusted with how the Professor has YET to release our grades, when grade finalization is noon tmr.
imh. too.
Has no incentive to make you feel special.
At Nikon service centre now. Thanks andrewgoh for the free wireless! Smiles :)
Baby don't you break my heart slow.
Nothing better to do now. Shall reply all the CS mails! :) Feels like penpal days all over again.
Putting you aside because I cannot take the Hu Leng Hu Re anymore. I'll miss you in the meantime but I think it's best for my heart.
Ok, not replying. I can leave in peace! :)
The weather's perfect for Travis' songs... Awesome.
Kidding about the last one. Just being dramatic.
"How is that 1) impt 2) sth to be discussed", I asked my friend. She said it's COG.DISSONANCE. I knew then that I had fallen madly in love.
One of the profs email me to ask for my number to discuss sth impt. Called and said she's removing penalty.
And I think one female student doctor (?) was coming across too strongly.. Doctors are rich right? I don't mind a sugar mommy.
Mom's much weaker after the scope this time, compared to last week's. She's sleeping right now.
2 profs called within a period of 15min to increase marks/up grade. Considerably good news to receive at the hospital. GPA 3.9 for this sem!
Learnt a new term. It's called Locally Advanced. That's the stage of cancer my mom's in. Hmm..
Can't decide whether to take 3 mods, I mean score 3 A+'s next semester, or just 2. The exchange uni is being a pain in the ass with my mods!
At the hospital now... Everything feels slow, including the internet. Yawwwn.
GPA 3.8/4.0 for the semester. Not too fabulous, but I'm still thankful, given the circumstances...
5am. I really really should sleep already. Hope to see you and talk to you soon but I'm not gonna have very high expectations!
I like it how you leave msgs and leave pms and found your way to my msn and overtalks me on msn. I'm really liking the switch of role.
And know what else I'm feeling? Unworthy. It feels like I'm just so fucked up that I deserve to have no parent. I'm unworthy of any love.
Can't sleep with all that tearing.. Can't sleep without all that tearing... I'm scared, y'know. FUCKING SCARED.
Reading about the diagnosis. This isn't the first critical illness I'm reading up on. It's painful.
Hello hello where are you and why are you not online. And no, I'm not going to Vietnam.
Watching Vagina Monologues. Hilarious as hell.
No time or room for whiners/losers. I have to rise up to the occasion.
